sentences.sentence: A neutral high sudsing liquid cleaner for water of an hardness, Hand Dishwashing Detergent.
sentences.translation: 涤剂手洗清洁剂：用手手洗各种质量的器皿，并适用在任何硬度水质。

sentences.sentence: This paper presents an effective and practical low sudsing cleaner of low temperature for bottle…
sentences.translation: 本文开发了一种适于啤酒饮料行业洗瓶工艺用的低温低泡清洗剂。

sentences.sentence: Another summertime double whammy-you can save money and get fit just by sudsing up your own vehicle.
sentences.translation: 另一个夏季“双重灾难”是：你可以自己洗刷爱车，既省了钱，又达到了塑身的目的。
